Name: Bliss Triple Oxygen Instant Energizing Eye Mask
Description:
Like an energy drink for your eyes, this instant brightening treatment is ‘eye-deal’ for those who want to fake a full 8 hours. With three forms of glow-inducing oxygen, antioxidant vitamin C and puff-pummeling cucumber extract, it’ll leave eyes looking lively in 15 minutes flat. Includes 4 undereye masks in unique dual-chamber packets exclusive to Bliss.
  • Web ID: 342857

Name: Benefit Cosmetics Gimme Brow Volumizing Fiber gel
Description:
An award-winning, innovative brush-on gel containing tiny micro fibers that adhere to skin and hair, creating full, lush-looking brows where before there were none. The water resistant, long lasting, buildable formula locks hairs in place while conditioning with Vitamin B5 and marshmallow extract. Gimme brow builds easily for thick, full arches, thanks to a tapered brush for blending and a precision tip for shaping. Now available in 3 shades, including the NEW medium shade with warm undertones.
  • 94% said brows looked visibly thicker*
  • Beauty tip: Define brows with precisely, my brow pencil’s ultra-fine tip, then brush gimme brow volumizing fiber gel through hairs to tame, tint & volumize.
  • Pair it with: Precisely, my brow pencil -- BROWVO! conditioning primer -- they’re real! lengthening mascara
  • How to use:
  • Using short pressing motions, stroke the precision tip along the brow to define & shape
  • Brush through with the custom tiny tapered brush to blend and build
  • Stroke on more to build thicker-looking brows
  • To get the most natural look, start at the inner edge of your brow and move outward
  • For the fullest, thickest-looking results, gently glide the brush against the direction of your hair growth starting at the tail, and allow the color to settle; then brush hairs back into place
  • *Consumer panel survey of 66 women after 1 week
  • Web ID: 2808901

Name: Too Faced Sweet Peach Eye Shadow Palette
Description:
A palette of 18 peach-scented eye shadows for limitless, timeless and modern looks. A new take on neutrals featuring fresh-picked shades of peachy pinks, corals and bronzes, along with pops of purples that will have you looking sweet as a peach year-round.
  • Infused with the skin-loving essence of peach
  • Rich, pigmented shadows offer true color payoff
  • Complementary for all skin tones
  • How to use:
